name: ordsson

body.origin:
|- wi(word(c0), wss(c0, con0))
-| word(con0)
-| wi(wa(word(c0), word(con0)), wss(c0, con0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (Ord(c0)→ c0 ⊆ On)
⊣ Ord(On)
⊣ ((Ord(c0)∧ Ord(On))→ c0 ⊆ On)

comment: Any ordinal class is a subclass of the class of ordinal numbers. Corollary 7.15 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 38. (Contributed by NM, 18-May-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 12-Aug-2011.)
